name: Skate Central of Sheffield
description: The Skate Central Roller Skating Rink was formerly the Silver Blades Ice Skating Rink. It now has public roller skating sessions, a roller hockey program, a pro shop, a cafe, and a bar.

name: Funky's Roller Skating and Adventure Play
address: Spar Road, Norwich, Eastern England, NR6 6AX UK
description: Funky's has a maple wood floor.

name: New Forum Roller Centre
description: The New forum Roller Centre roller skating rink in Cambridge closed on August 31, 2004 but the owners are looking for a new skating venue for the 8 wheels Rollersports club. They are also planning to build a new skating center at some point in the future.

name: Roller City
address: The Campus West, Welwyn Garden City, Hertfordshire, England, United Kingdom
description: Roller City is located at the Campus West in Welwyn Garden City. It is connected with the Welwyn Hatfield Borough Roller City and the Hawthorne Theatre.

name: Rollerworld of Colchester
address: Eastgates, Harts Lane, Colchester, Essex County, Eastern England CO7 7QH UK
description: Rollerworld has a 25 x 50 meter maple floor.

name: Rollerworld of Derby
description: Derby's Rollerworld has a maple wood floor. Facilities include two rinks, a cafe, and a bar and several times a year they have all-night skating parties.

name: Silver Wheels of Altrincham
address: Woodfield House on Woodfield Road, Broadheath, Altrincham, Cheshire County, England, WA14 4ET United Kingdom
description: Does Silver Wheels have a Web site?

name: Sk8 Madness
address: Old Warrington road, Northwich, Cheshire CW9 7NH Uk
description: This 25,000 square foot skating facility has a beginner's rink, a recreational rink, and an aggressive skate park.

name: Skate City of Hazel Grove
address: School Street Industrial Estate, Unit 1A, Hazel Grove, Stockport, Cheshire County, Northwest England, SK7 4RA UK
description: Also known as Rollergrove and Roller Grove.

name: Skaters Roller Rink
address: The Chase, Mill Road, Walpole Highway, Wisbech, Cambridgeshire PE14 7QJ
description: Skaters Roller Rink has a 12,000 square foot maple floor, a bar, and a small video game arcade.

name: Eco Dome Twin Ice and Roller Skating Rinks
description: This proposed facility for a 27 acre parcel of land in Gorleston, Norfolk would have two domes, one for an Olympic size ice skating rink and one that would be a combination roller skating rink and concert venue with 10,000 seats. If all goes as planned the facility will open in early 2009. Facility was designed by Mellinsus and Johnson Design Architects.

name: Arun Saturday Night Roller Skating Sessions
address: Arun Leisure Centre, Felpham Way, Bognor Regis, West Sussex, England UK
description: Public skating sessions every Saturday night from 7 to 9 pm. Sessions are arranged by the Arun Roller Skating Club but they are open to the public.

name: Coppenhall Leisure Centre Roller Rink
address: Coronation Street, Crewe, South Cheshire, England CW1 4DJ United Kingdom
description: Sessions include an under-age-16 roller disco, a roller games session for kids, a session for kids under 10 and their parents and an all-ages family session.

name: Deepings Leisure Centre
address: Park Road, Deeping Saint James, Peterborough PE6 8NF
description: The Deepings Leisure Centre near Peterborough runs roller skating sessions Friday evenings (7:30 p.m. to 9:30 p.m.) and Sunday afternoons (3:00 p.m. to 5:00 p.m.). Entry fee is around Â£2 per session.

name: Harrow Leisure Centre Friday Skating Sessions
address: Bryon Hall (behind Harrow Leisure Centre), Christchurch Avenue, Harrow, England HA3 5BD United Kingdom

name: North Hertz Leisure Centre
description: The North Herts Leisure in Letchworth runs roller skating sessions on Saturdays at lunchtime (1:00 p.m. to 3:00 p.m.) and on Sunday afternoons (4:00 p.m. to 6:00 p.m.).

name: Southwick Saturday Night Roller Disco
address: Southwick Leisure Centre, Old Barn Way, Southwick, Brighton, England UK
description: Roller disco every Saturday except during the month of August. 5:00 pm Family session has a speed limit. 6.15 pm session is for experienced skaters of all ages and beginners over 13 years. Games are played at each session and all ages are welcome. For skate hire booking and other information phone 01273-238111.
